thread.title: 10 Simple Things You've Been Doing Wrong All Your Life
thread.title_full: 10 Simple Things You've Been Doing Wrong All Your Life

author: Dushyant Jain
title: 10 Simple Things You've Been Doing Wrong All Your Life

organizations.name: freeze coffee cubes for iced coffee  skip

text:
IN Creative ON 25 Feb, 2017 10 Simple Things Youâ€™ve Been Doing Wrong All Your Life Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Who doesn't love to learn new habits that make life simpler? From creative baking tips to the cheapest iPhone speaker you've ever seen, here's a roundup of interesting ideas that you may have never thought of. 
Try these shortcuts out and see what works best for you. 10 Simple Things You've Been Doing Wrong All Your Life 754 396 wrong things bad habits daily things that we do #1. A Plastic Cup Makes An Instant Loudspeaker 
A clean and dry plastic cup, of course. Set your smartphone in the cup and the device's speaker will instantly be amplified. #2. Try Eating Cupcakes Differently 
If you have the patience to cut it in half and create a cupcake sandwich, go for it. #3. Cupcake Liners Make Great Drink Covers 
Keep the bugs out at your next picnic. #4. Find Other Uses For Household Tools 
A dustpan makes a good funnel for filling up large buckets that won't fit in the sink. #5. Sliced Bread Keeps Baked Goods fresh and doesn't let it dry 
The wavy side goes towards your scalp, not the flat side. This increases grip. #7. How About Peeling Bananas? 
Don't peel from the stem-this is what pulls all the stringy bits off the peel. Pull from the opposite end for no strings. #8. Staple Removers Help Open Up Key Rings 
No more need to break your nails. In a pinch, an actual key can usually wedge itself in there as well so that you can open the ring. #9. Bag Up Your Ice Cream 
Placing ice cream in a zipped baggie will help it from getting freezer burnt and hard! #10. Freeze Coffee Cubes For Iced Coffee 
Skip the weirdness of frozen water and keep your iced coffee concentrated. Loved this? Spread it out then
